content:
That's a great idea! Checking your email should give you the most up-to-date information on your points balance. And yay for planning to redeem your points for a discount on your book purchase!

Once you find out your current points balance, you can update me and I'll add it to your list. That way, you can keep track of all your loyalty programs in one place.

Also, don't forget to check the terms and conditions of Page & Co.'s loyalty program to see if there are any restrictions on redeeming points or if there's a minimum purchase required to use your points.

Let me know when you find out your points balance, and I'll help you update your list!
